attrs.script:
tee /etc/modules-load.d/overlay.conf <<-'EOF'
overlay
EOF

mkdir -p genconf
tee genconf/ip-detect <<-'EOF'
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -o nounset -o errexit
export PATH=/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:$PATH
echo $(ip addr show eth0 | grep -Eo '[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' | head -1)
EOF
tee genconf/config.yaml <<-'EOF'
---
agent_list:
- <agent-private-ip-1>
- <agent-private-ip-2>
- <agent-private-ip-3>
- <agent-private-ip-4>
- <agent-private-ip-5>
# Use this bootstrap_url value unless you have moved the DC/OS installer assets.
bootstrap_url: file:///opt/dcos_install_tmp
cluster_name: dcosntnx
exhibitor_storage_backend: static
master_discovery: static
ip_detect_public_filename: genconf/ip-detect
master_list:
- <master-private-ip-1>
- <master-private-ip-2>
- <master-private-ip-3>
public_agent_list:
- <public-agent-private-ip>
resolvers:
- 8.8.4.4
- 8.8.8.8
ssh_port: 22
ssh_user: root
EOF

tee /etc/modules-load.d/overlay.conf <<-'EOF'
overlay
EOF

tee /etc/yum.repos.d/docker.repo <<-'EOF'
[dockerrepo]
name=Docker Repository
baseurl=https://yum.dockerproject.org/repo/main/centos/$releasever/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://yum.dockerproject.org/gpg
EOF
mkdir -p /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d && sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d/override.conf <<- EOF
[Service]
ExecStart=
ExecStart=/usr/bin/dockerd --storage-driver=overlay
EOF
yum install -y docker-engine-1.13.1 docker-engine-selinux-1.13.1
systemctl disable firewalld
systemctl stop firewalld
sed -i s/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=permissive/g /etc/selinux/config &&
groupadd nogroup &&
groupadd docker &&
sleep 10
systemctl start docker
systemctl enable docker

tee /etc/yum.repos.d/docker.repo <<-'EOF'
[dockerrepo]
name=Docker Repository
baseurl=https://yum.dockerproject.org/repo/main/centos/$releasever/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://yum.dockerproject.org/gpg
EOF
mkdir -p /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d && sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d/override.conf <<- EOF
[Service]
ExecStart=
ExecStart=/usr/bin/dockerd --storage-driver=overlay
EOF
yum install -y docker-engine-1.13.1 docker-engine-selinux-1.13.1
systemctl disable firewalld
systemctl stop firewalld
sed -i s/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=permissive/g /etc/selinux/config &&
groupadd nogroup &&
groupadd docker &&
sleep 10
systemctl start docker
systemctl enable docker

action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
yum upgrade --assumeyes --tolerant
yum update --assumeyes
yum install -y tar xz unzip curl ipset
yum install ntp -y
echo "goodbye"
